snippet: Top-seeded Stan Wawrinka lost to eighth-seeded Benoît Paire, 6-4, 1-6, 7-5, on Friday in the quarterfinals of the Open 13 in Marseille, France....
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Stan Wawrinka lost to eighth-seeded Benoît Paire, 6-4, 1-6, 7-5, on Friday in the quarterfinals of the Open 13 in Marseille, France.
abstract: Benoit Paire beats Stan Wawrinka in quarterfinals at Open 13 in Marseille, France; other tennis news noted.
